channel.title: Secure Boot on The Asura Linux Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Secure Boot on The Asura Linux Blog

item.title: Understanding the Linux Boot Sequence
item.description: In my previous post on the Asura Linux blog, I introduced Asura Linux as an Open Source project to experiment with different ways of building and running modern general-purpose Linux systemsâ€”and to share what we learn along the way. I explained why the Asura Linux Project exists and what I was thinking about the immediate future. If you haven’t seen it, please have a look. In my excitement about introducing the project, I promised to publish the second blog post about the Linux boot process shortly.
